import React from 'react' import Moment from 'react-moment' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import ProfileExperience from '../profile/ProfileEducation' import { addLikes,removeLikes } from '../../Actions/post' const PostItem = ({post: {_id,text,name,avatar,user,likes,comments,date}}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() return (

{name}

{text}

Posted on {date}

Discussion {comments.length > 0 ? ({comments.length}) : 0} {user === localStorage.getItem('token') ? ( ) : null}
) } export default PostItem
